Articles.Content:
{If someone can make a sig-friendly banner, I would rep them! }

Hey, people! Have you ever noticed something odd or strange--such as a structure on Minmus, or an odd collision report, or any other potential Easter egg? If you posted a thread about it, it was probably brushed off as one of those pranks people do to get attention, or as a one-time glitch. But not here at the JSP Anomaly Investigation Committee! I take all claims of new Easter eggs very seriously, as the game is so big that no one can possibly see every square inch of the game world. I investigate all claims. Simply post your claim using the form at the bottom of this post, and I'll go investigate. Oh, and while you're at it, browse the reports I've already written!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Welcome to the Anomaly Investigation Committee headquarters. As you can see, we are housed in a secret bunker at the South Pole, mostly cut off from the rest of Kerbin. However, we blew the budget on the bunker and did not have money to build a launch pad, so we have to launch from the Jedi Space Program launch center, which destroys our secrecy. But we still like to pretend we're all secret, so don't say that we aren't. Just pretend you have a Level One Million security clearance to everything.

We have a color code for the three possible outcomes to our investigations:

Red means the report was false--the anomaly does not exist, or was a bug. This is disappointing, but it happens in most cases.

Yellow means something strange was definitely sighted, and we are awaiting confirmation from the government (Squad).

Green means that the report is confirmed as an Easter egg, either by obviousness or by the government (again, Squad). This is incredibly rare, and is always an amazing day for the AIC.

The Filing Cabinet--Find Reports Here!

The Case Of The Minmus Sphere-- our first case, taken from the "what did you do in KSP today" thread. Report link soon.

Anomaly Report Form

Anomaly: Describe the anomaly in as much detail as possible. Screenshot is recommended.

Anomaly Location: Obvious. Exact coordinates are recommended, if you have them.

Extra Notes: Add anything extra here.

Oh, one more thing--reports of already-confirmed Easter eggs will be ignored.
Just going to shamelessly bump/necro this, to check for interest again...

Hey, this sounds really interesting!

Also, I think I might mess around and see what I can make for a signature banner. However, it's been a while since I've reviewed the rules for signatures, so I was wondering where I could find those. Thanks!

Hey, this sounds really interesting!

Also, I think I might mess around and see what I can make for a signature banner. However, it's been a while since I've reviewed the rules for signatures, so I was wondering where I could find those. Thanks!

Signature rules are mixed into the main rules. Thank you!
